quote: If escalation is so bad, why do so many places have escalators? Take that, security community!

context: Dynamic implementations of drivers and interfaces (Kernel-modules, OpenGL, ...) dlopen-ing and executing random files if you ask them "nicely", and StylePainter potentially having to do the same, leading to Filiph Sandström saying "Potential privilege escalation, it's not a bug it's a feature™"

quote: ISO C++ is a conspiracy by big diagnostic to sell you more compiler diagnostics
author: CxByte
context:
me: I'll just make NavigationParams match the spec
every call site that was constructing one with C++ designated initializers: error: ISO C++ requires field designators to be specified in declaration order; field 'reserved_environment' will be initialized after field 'navigable' [-Werror,-Wreorder-init-list]
